channel.title: Harry Potter Scape
channel.description:
[b][shadow=red,left]For the mods wondering. Im currently doing internal prework. If you want me to remove my Development post until i start working on the Exterior of the server and i can show some pictures. Please pm me and let me know. I will save what ive posted and ask for it to be removed. :) Thanks.[/shadow][/b]
Well its working name anyways, but i've started development of Harry Potter Scape.
I've decided to take what Jagex gave us, using the maps and the models, and design them to fit my own needs. I plan to create a harry potter game/with a runescape theme of sorts.
I've so far eliminated the general skills, and started Adding skills of my own.
So far i have come up with the following "skills": Charms: A class in which you will be taught spells that allow you to do certain things, such as unlock a hidden room in the castle or a drawer or chest. Plus you will learn quite a few spells useable from the spell book in this class
Transfiguration: I have been working on a replace npc boolean allowing for a "transmutation of sorts". The plan is to have three-five spells in the normal mage book set aside to use on npcs, objects, and even other players (something thats going to take a bit of work. pnpc other in other words)
Defense Against the Dark Arts: A class in which you will learn the other majority of your spells in the general spell book. These are going to be mostly the spells used in Dueling. (explained later)
Dueling: Aha, something that will really attract attention. Yes i plan on adding one on one dueling, except theres no silly autocasting itll be the fastest clicker, the best choice of spells, and so on. The thing about dueling is i want to add MP. Magic Power in other words. As you use a spell you expend a certain amount of MP. It will autoreplenish (not too hard), but the stronger you are the larger your MP reserves.
There are still more in the works. Ive been suggested many things.
As to the question will i be making my own client? Eventually maybe. But I am challenging myself to use the models and such that are already given to me in a 317 client.
YES 317. lol.
Anyways, this is me flaunting. Please i want some critique. :)
UPDATE!!::
So far ive started with choosing my source. My current choice is Dragon-History. It was the first non-bin organized stable source i could find. Im removing almost 60% of the client.java lol. I'm about 20% of the way done with it. Its a slow process. You wouldnt believe how much STUPID CRAP people dont even realize is taking up space in the client.java and other major server files. I mean seriously. If you sat down and cleaned up half of your relays and combine them. (as in boolean process.) Lag goes way down. and no need for a vps really. LOL I mean im shrinking the files so much. Even the character files im going to make smaller. Why have about 30 int's in them. When you only need the basic ones.
Timelimit10, a.k.a Becca

item.title: Harry Potter Scape
item.dc:creator: @Timelimit10 Timelimit10
item.description:
@Timelimit10 wrote:

Eh. I would prefer there to be no drama. Cuz why fight? its stupid. LOL.

Update: I am currently shrinking the client.java. I’ve eliminated a good portion so far and im not even half done. I am not removing any of the real-time, or anything thats really needed for smooth gameplay.

Ive removed a majority of the minigame CRAP people place in most sources. Im trying to just plain remove anything i dont need. To allow for less lag and better game play.

Read full topic

item.title: Harry Potter Scape
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

[quote=“Timelimit10, post:15, topic:307688”]Why will it fail? honestly, this is more of a challenge development. you act like im trying to go big? no. i just want to try and do something creative.
some of you guys that talk about czar make me laugh because most of you dont remember the “good servers” that were out shortly before czar were 10x as bad. dodian released not long after czar trying to set a bar. so yea. NO.
Im recreating my home home location. I am combining levels of castles together to make the castle larger. or atleast thats the plan. to connect them by ladders and make them appear on top of each other.
Change some models? Did you not read as i said im leaving the models from 317 and attempting to go from there.
But thanks for the well wishes.

Also towards the fast clicking thing. it will all be about who can cast the fastest versus who is the strongest versus best spell choice.

=D[/quote]

Don’t pay attention to him, he is just mad that you can do something he can’t.

[quote="`jeba, post:14, topic:307688"]As much as this does seem weird and funny. It’s going to fail, I’m sorry.

I honestly like to support people, but this wont go far. I can tell.

Fastest clicker idea for dueling? So, you’re going to download a craply coded Czar and change some models, remove the stuff from RS…

Honestly, this will fail. But as a supportive person, I say good luck.[/quote]

Your disrespect towards her is horrible. I suggest that you stop.

Read full topic

item.title: Harry Potter Scape
item.dc:creator: @Timelimit10 Timelimit10
item.description:
@Timelimit10 wrote:

well im working on a few things like tranfiguring opponent into an animal for dueling. It could last like 5 seconds. then wear off. but it would take a huge amount of MP and would have a rather large timer on it. I am removing melee and range. this will be a pure Magic game. No fisticuffs ^.^ lol. Ill keep this updated as i add things. I planned on making good use of the talking hat. And please guys more ideas are welcomed. I will update what ive done as i do it. =)

Read full topic

@Explisionist wrote:

In all the movies There is a character with a sword/melee weapon. It could be just some random guy also…

You will need to change the robe look’s, and add the talking hat from the magic training place, replace the dialog with the harry potter one, along with a random chooser for the options.

Also maybe remove all weapons besides the wands and a few of the other items. Another amazing thing would be add the spell like off of the frog random event so u can turn people into frogs…
